register.reg_long_name: Performance Monitors Instruction Counter Filter Register

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Synchronous mode. Controls whether a PMU exception generated by the counter is synchronous or asynchronous.

field_value_description.para: Asynchronous PMU exception is enabled.
Synchronous PMU exception is enabled.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
EL1 filtering. Controls counting instructions in EL1.
If Secure and Non-secure states are implemented, then counting instructions in Non-secure EL1 is further controlled by PMICFILTR_EL0.NSK.
If is implemented, then counting instructions in Realm EL1 is further controlled by PMICFILTR_EL0.RLK.
If EL3 is implemented, then counting instructions in EL3 is further controlled by PMICFILTR_EL0.M.

field_value_description.para: This field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
Instructions in EL1 are not counted.

field_description.para: EL0 filtering. Controls counting instructions in EL0.
If Secure and Non-secure states are implemented, then counting instructions in Non-secure EL0 is further controlled by PMICFILTR_EL0.NSU.
If is implemented, then counting instructions in Realm EL0 is further controlled by PMICFILTR_EL0.RLU.

field_value_description.para: This field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
Instructions in EL0 are not counted.

field_description.para: Non-secure EL1 filtering. Controls counting instructions in Non-secure EL1. If PMICFILTR_EL0.NSK is not equal to PMICFILTR_EL0.P, then instructions in Non-secure EL1 are not counted. Otherwise, PMICFILTR_EL0.NSK has no effect on filtering of instructions in Non-secure EL1.

field_value_description.para: When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 0, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 1, instructions in Non-secure EL1 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 0, instructions in Non-secure EL1 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 1, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

Non-secure EL0 filtering. Controls counting instructions in Non-secure EL0. If PMICFILTR_EL0.NSU is not equal to PMICFILTR_EL0.U, then instructions in Non-secure EL0 are not counted. Otherwise, PMICFILTR_EL0.NSU has no effect on filtering of instructions in Non-secure EL0.

field_value_description.para: When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 0, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 1, instructions in Non-secure EL0 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 0, instructions in Non-secure EL0 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 1, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
EL2 filtering. Controls counting instructions in EL2.
If EL3 is implemented and is implemented, then counting instructions in Secure EL2 is further controlled by PMICFILTR_EL0.SH.
If is implemented, then counting instructions in Realm EL2 is further controlled by PMICFILTR_EL0.RLH.

field_value_description.para: Instructions in EL2 are not counted.
This field has no effect on filtering of instructions.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

EL3 filtering. Controls counting instructions in EL3. If PMICFILTR_EL0.M is not equal to PMICFILTR_EL0.P, then instructions in EL3 are not counted. Otherwise, PMICFILTR_EL0.M has no effect on filtering of instructions in EL3.

field_value_description.para: When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 0, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 1, instructions in EL3 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 0, instructions in EL3 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 1, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.

Secure EL2 filtering. Controls counting instructions in Secure EL2. If PMICFILTR_EL0.SH is equal to PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH, then instructions in Secure EL2 are not counted. Otherwise, PMICFILTR_EL0.SH has no effect on filtering of instructions in Secure EL2.

field_value_description.para: When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 0, instructions in Secure EL2 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 1, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 0, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 1, instructions in Secure EL2 are not counted.

field.fields_condition: When EL3 is implemented and FEAT_SEL2 is implemented

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Non-transactional state filtering. Controls counting instructions in Non-transactional state.

field_value_description.para: This field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
Instructions in Non-transactional state are not counted.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

Realm EL1 filtering. Controls counting instructions in Realm EL1. If PMICFILTR_EL0.RLK is not equal to PMICFILTR_EL0.P, then instructions in Realm EL1 are not counted. Otherwise, PMICFILTR_EL0.RLK has no effect on filtering of instructions in Realm EL1.

field_value_description.para: When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 0, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 1, instructions in Realm EL1 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 0, instructions in Realm EL1 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.P == 1, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

Realm EL0 filtering. Controls counting instructions in Realm EL0. If PMICFILTR_EL0.RLU is not equal to PMICFILTR_EL0.U, then instructions in Realm EL0 are not counted. Otherwise, PMICFILTR_EL0.RLU has no effect on filtering of instructions in Realm EL0.

field_value_description.para: When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 0, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 1, instructions in Realm EL0 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 0, instructions in Realm EL0 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.U == 1, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

Realm EL2 filtering. Controls counting instructions in Realm EL2. If PMICFILTR_EL0.RLH is equal to PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH, then instructions in Realm EL2 are not counted. Otherwise, PMICFILTR_EL0.RLH has no effect on filtering of instructions in Realm EL2.

field_value_description.para: When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 0, instructions in Realm EL2 are not counted.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 1, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 0, this field has no effect on filtering of instructions.
When PMICFILTR_EL0.NSH == 1, instructions in Realm EL2 are not counted.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Event to count.
Reads as 0x0008.

access_permission_text.para: PMICFILTR_EL0 reads-as-zero and ignores writes if all of the following are true:
PMICFILTR_EL0 ignores writes if all of the following are true:

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
